verses.name: Matthew 14:6
verses.text: But when Herod’s birthday was kept, the daughter of Herodias danced before them, and pleased Herod.

verses.name: Matthew 14:7
verses.text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask.

verses.name: Matthew 14:8
verses.text: And she, being before instructed of her mother, said, Give me here John Baptist’s head in a charger.

verses.name: Matthew 14:9
verses.text: And the king was sorry: nevertheless for the oath’s sake, and them which sat with him at meat, he commanded it to be given her.

verses.name: Matthew 14:10
verses.text: And he sent, and beheaded John in the prison.
